name: The Gobbling Box
overview: Gobbling Box is a 1 - 2 player Pac-Man clone for the TRS-80. The gobbler must eat all the dots in a maze, while avoiding the zonkers Chris and Cross. If the player eats an energizer, the zonkers can temporarily become vulnerable, and run from the player. A tame zonker, if eaten, is sent back to the starting area. When the player consumes all dots, they move to a new maze and gain a new gobbler. The player starts with 3 gobbler, and when all are lost, it's game over.
